name: Health And Medicine 2 Quiz | Mixed Health Questions | 10 Questions

questions.text: The brain stops growing in size when you are about 16-18 years old.
questions.explanation:
True.

	The size is fixed by then although the brain continues to develop in capability.

questions.text: Color blindness is found exclusively in males.
questions.explanation:
False.

	It affects about 20 times as many more males than females, but it isn't exclusively a male problem.

questions.text: Librium is used to treat people who are manic-depressives.
Fatty substances in the blood are increased by exercise.
The evaporation of sweat raises the body temperature.
questions.explanation:
False.

	The opposite applies - it lowers it.

questions.text: According to researchers, high blood pressure is more prevalent among blacks than among whites?
questions.explanation:
True.

	Information according to Encarta Encyclopedia.

questions.text: It is almost impossible to sneeze with your eyes open.
The human heart is about as big as a good sized fist.
questions.explanation:
True.

	A closed fist according to Encarta Encyclopedia.

questions.text: Researchers have found that stuttering is 4 to 6 times more common in boys than in girls.
If the liver stops working a person will die within 8 to 24 hours.
